attributes.action: Get Social Services involved after A Childs Life was Broadcast
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This was an utterly shocking insight and I know people are outraged at this, those children need help from Social Services and fast...before it is too late, one child has already tried to suffocate themself. If people want to get involved in this petition please do we want your support.
For the people who havent seen this shocking footage you need to, I think it's repeated in the early hours of Saturday morning on Channel 4.
